title: Landslide
lyrics:
There's a landslide back home
Pity I can't hold on
I should really behold
My world washed clear by stone
There's a landslide back home

Only when I'm alone

Could we ever have known

How the waves would return



Oh, aye

Oh, aye

Oh, aye

Oh, aye



There's a landslide back home

Now I can't really go on

And I laid on the stone

And it keeps my heart warm



If you ever return

In a wonderful form

Don't you wait out the storm

Just pull roots and move on



There's a landslide back home

Pity I can't hold on

I should really behold

My world washed clear by stone



Oh, aye

Oh, aye

Oh, aye

Oh, aye

Oh, aye

Oh, aye

Oh, aye

Oh, aye

Oh, aye

Oh, aye

Oh, aye

Oh, aye
